# decodingError

**Instance Property**

The underlying decoding error.

## Declaration

```swift
var decodingError: DecodingError
```

## Getting Error Information

- **columnName**: The name of the column with the error.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the column decoding error suitable for debugging.
- **rowIndex**: The index of the column’s element with the error.

items.description: The name of the column with the error.
